entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-900
Model: LMR-900
Type: cable
0.870" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 87.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.18 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.32 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 0.4 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 0.58 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 0.85 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 1.24 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 1.28 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 1.45 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 2.55 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 0.870" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
common_uses: Long flexible runs with low loss
